answerText: small intestine[10] This middle segment of the small intestine begins at the ligament of Treitz. It comes after the duodenum and before the ileum.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 5 | 15 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Peyer's patches are lumps of immune tissue found in this organ.  [10] Name this segment of the digestive system that connects the large intestine and the stomach. It receives bile from the sphincter of Oddi.
